header.rec_loc: Recording was made in Kenilworth, Warwickshire, West Midlands, ANON’s friend’s home.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Food, Drink, a film and the plot and characters as well as possible hidden meanings (Cloudy with a chance of meatballs), how to operate the tv remote, appetite, work, feminism, artwork, how conversation has changed, taboo topics and global issues, religion, race, a kid’s understanding of the film.
header.activity: Talking about the day at work whilst watching a kid’s film on tv.

body.u: I wonder if my phone's updated yet?
did the update loading screen and then just went back to the update loading screen
is that great? don't need it anyway
yeah I know where they are but I was just making conversation
hope it isn't busy in the
yeah but not being funny you're working three hours that's fine you know
would you like to do six hours at the diner today?
yeah thought as much I'm hungry as well and I don't wanna eat at the diner cos I don't wanna spend my last five pounds on diner food
breakfast if we go now we could make it
it's tempting but I don't even think we can afford it
no you can have one I'm okay
I wouldn't do that without you
well we could have a single one each they're like one pound seventy-nine or something
if you want one I'd go get one but I'm okay
no I'm alright then I might go to the shop to get something to eat though
I don't know actually no I won't bother I doubt we'll have time
everyone else who gets a break at the diner manages to go to Mcdonalds or whatever you're the only one that has a half an hour break and uses fifteen minutes and then still puts half an hour
yeah but I don't even have breaks any more anyway
no only six hours I'm working
it's four hours before you need a break
right I'm gonna google the shit out of this because I think it's six hours if we're both wrong that's gonna be funny
alright I've typed in legal breaks how long? cos my brain's not working very
oh yeah yeah twenty minutes if you've worked more than six hours
is that an American or US law?
that's what I mean shut up
fucking hell trick question or what?
everyone I've spoken to said four hours
no workers have the right to eleven hours rest between working days as well so if they finish work at eight PM they shouldn't start work till seven next day
I thought everyone I've spoken to said the maximum was four hours before you need a break
er workers have the right to either an in uninterrupted twenty-four hours without any work each week or an uninterrupted forty-eight hours without any work each fortnight
pretty sure we don't get that no there we go
cos I'm not wrong okay maybe I might be government thing
why are you why? I wanna know what?
I didn't say anything I'm asleep sh
you're mean oh did you see that?
it's full of posh Warwick people being posh and boring
it's funny when you get closer into cov you think it's all the cov students ripping the piss into the Warwick students and Warwick are oh
no it is or it's cov students innit?
innit fam? yeah it was when I was looking round it I was like lovely I'll just go back to Lancaster now
well that was only the foreign ones
tense face up on the train between me wearing my uni sweater and a cov uni student wearing his I'll keep you posted ah it's funny
maybe something like turned out he's alright actually what? that says two replies why does it say no replies?
I don't know what is this with all these hippopotamuses and then they go?
oh some guy posted a story like every day and had dinosaurs and shit plastic dinosaurs and goats and things and you just yeah that story happened
I didn't really watch all of it cos studying really hard
Lancaster uni some people live in Lancaster
yeah but no most people go home if they live there because free food
I think your wifi's just not working
what's that directly underneath it? did you hip click then?
yes I did what was that for?
I'm just being sensitive I'm gonna get hurt now aren't I?
er yeah I don't need to breathe
skin ripples ah no you can't do that
no don't like it makes me sad inside
I'm gonna check my er university email
do you need any more tabs open?
shut up they all have a purpose
just slow my phone down as much as possible
here we go see this will take me directly to my email
I've been getting too many emails cos stupid Christmas load of bollocks I don't need to be reminded every day three times a day about your twenty percent discount I don't care
be nice if you stay still slightly so that I can actually click on the the button but it's sorted now thank you so yeah please don't do that
oh and that's good isn't it?

Lancaster erm student news kind of newsletter thing so the twelve days of fitness at the sports centre every day from Sunday the thirteenth to Thursday the twenty-fourth of December when no one's there
there'll be a festive offer for you to take advantage of no I'd rather eat cake
rather eat cake and not at Lancaster
after Christmas I'll be there way big 's gonna join as well
no I think is the sports centre on a hill?

sort of it's at the bottom of a very big hill now imagine if that had happened on a day I'd come up to see you? I'd have been bolloxed cos I wouldn't have been able to get a lift back from anyone and wouldn't be able to get any trains or anything
what do you mean wouldn't be able to get a lift back? and if I was getting home
no no I mean if if it was like a different week and I'd just come up to visit you know?
you'd just have to stay a bit longer
oh grab yourself a free lunch and a ten pounds Amazon voucher by helping bring an award winning app idea to life
no thanks it sounds like I have to do work
yeah don't like the first part of that word sounds like too much effort what?
you said my you said make my laugh
no I was putting on a funny accent because I was bored stop being mean all the time
mean you know I'm not mean to you
no can you not go to work cos this is really comfy
I mean it I don't wanna move
I really do not wanna go to work either so yeah I will gladly stay here but erm at the same time I've gotta earn money because otherwise I'm gonna be really poor when I go back to uni
we could both have food poisoning from the potatoes that we got given
mm we need the money anyway
find what's on my hair tie my only hair tie need to see if clothes are dry
yeah you should probably go soon
yeah are you like not gonna shave ever?
I'm interested to see how much facial hair you can grow
no but I am interested because maybe you will surprise yourself and oh my god there's a long one
don't pull away when I'm holding onto it then
you are lying on my lap what more can you expect?
oh your face is so soft okay go on shall we see if the tumble dryer is done? la la la la la la yeah? oh no frowny face with some wrinkledge oh no no you can't
where is it? no come on I have to go to work now look can I get ready and stuff?
can can you chuck my leggings in the tumble dryer?
yeah but I can't can't get up cos you've trapped me in
I haven't trapped you you're not trapped you're just lazy
what's that can I do you a favour? I dunno maybe I'm too lazy?
